tradeMessage: **{userTagReceiver}**, **{userTag}** would like to trade their {itemNameGet} with you in exchange for a(n) {itemNameGive}; say `all good` to confirm.
tradeMessageAccepted:
**{userTagReceiver}**, please type `!trade `{userTag}` shibeNumber` to trade one of your shibes for a **{itemName}**
(You can get your shibe numbers from `!inventory`)
sellError: **{userTag}**, please specify the item number from your inventory followed by the number of bepis you want to sell the item
buyError: **{userTag}**, please specify a valid item number from the shop
buySuccess: **{userTag}**, you have bought **{itemName}** from **{sellerTag}** for {paidCoins} bepis <:bepis:466777977179602996>
buyNotEnoughCoins: **{userTag}**, you don't have enough bepis to buy that item
sellErrorCoins: **{userTag}**, please enter a value greater than 0
unSellError: **{userTag}**, please specify the item number from your inventory.
catchWaitMessage: ðŸš« **{userTag}**, you need to wait another **{hours} hours, {minutes} minutes, and {seconds} seconds** before catching another Shibe
generateInvite:
**{userTag}**, please use the following link to invite your frens:
{inviteLink}
eventFailCatchMessage: **{userTag}**, you've already participated in this event.
giveAwayError: **{userTag}**, please specify the item number from your inventory
giveAwayMessage: **{userTag}**, you've received {receivedCoins} bepis for **{itemName}**. Now you have {totalCoins} bepis <:bepis:466777977179602996>!
giveAwayErrorShop: **{userTag}**, you can't give away items that are currently for sale in the shop
tradeErrorShop: **{userTag}**, you can't trade items that are currently for sale in the shop
tradeError: Could not trade items since one of the items is no longer available
newTrick: Teaches the bot a new command that uses a keyword to execute a function
invFuse: Fuses two items together forming a new item
